text: Mohamed Merza Salman (born 17 April 1987) is a Bahraini handball player for Al-Najma and the Bahraini national team.2019 World Men's Handball Championship roster He participated at the 2017 World Men's Handball Championship.2017 World Championship roster ==References== Category:1987 births Category:Living people Category:Bahraini male handball players Category:Bahraini expatriate sportspeople in Saudi Arabia Category:Expatriate handball players Category:Handball players at the 2014 Asian Games Category:Handball players at the 2018 Asian Games Category:Asian Games silver medalists for Bahrain Category:Asian Games bronze medalists for Bahrain Category:Asian Games medalists in handball Category:Medalists at the 2014 Asian Games Category:Medalists at the 2018 Asian Games
title: Mohamed Merza
